name: MERN Stack
description: A complete guide to building full-stack web applications using the MERN stack — MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. It teaches how to develop dynamic frontends with React, create scalable backend APIs with Node and Express, integrate databases with MongoDB, implement authentication and authorization, and follow real-world development workflows for deploying modern full-stack projects.

topicsTaught: Backend Development with Express and Node.js
chatbot.whyRelevant: This course demonstrates strong understanding of end-to-end web application development, covering both frontend and backend engineering with industry-standard tools.
